content: the mountain clouds blanket is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets printed versions of the skies light version of the blanket is available for a small fee via scheepjes stockists scheepjes stone washed minerals xl version **scheepjes stone washed minerals xl** 70% cotton x 30% acrylic 50g/75m yarn a 901 agate aria x 9 balls **scheepjes stone washed xl** 70% cotton x 30% acrylic 50g/175m yarn b 853 amazonite x 3 balls yarn c 845 blue apatite x 3 balls yarn d 846 canada jade x 3 balls yarn e 844 boulder opal x 3 balls yarn f 841 moon stone x 11 balls 4 5mm crochet hook 4 stitch markers scheepjes skies light version **scheepjes skies light mini hank pack** 100% premium blend cotton 28g/95m yarn a 109 cirrocumulus x 1 hank yarn b 110 cirrus x 1 hank yarn c 111 cumulus x 1 hank yarn d 112 altocumulus x 1 hank yarn e 113 altostratus x 1 hank yarn f 114 stratus x 1 hank yarn g 115 cirrostratus x 1 hank yarn h 116 cumulonimbus x 1 hank yarn i 117 circumcumulus x 1 hank **scheepjes skies light** 100% premium blend cotton 100g/340m yarn a 109 cirrocumulus x 1 hank **scheepjes cotton 8** 100% cotton 50g/170m yarn j 502 x 5 balls ** or alternatively scheepjes skies light** 100% premium blend cotton 100g/340m yarn j 118 undyed x 3 hanks note the patterns of both versions are identical aside from how many motifs you need to make per colour and the required crochet hook size the printed and digital versions of the skies light version has a small errata you can find the errata here 1 1 https //www scheepjes com/en/errata-yarn-the-after-party-65-5236/
